      • roll

        public int roll​(int numToRollTill)
        Roll the dice until target number is rolled face up.
        Parameters:
        numToRollTill - Target number.
        Returns:
        the last roll, aka the target number.

      • roll

        public int roll​(int numToRollTill,
                boolean doPrint)
        Roll the dice until target number is rolled face up. Has option to remove print statements.
        Parameters:
        numToRollTill - Target number.
        doPrint - True if you want to print each roll and number of rolls taken.
        Returns:
        the last roll, aka the target number.
